CaseSolution.name: CaseSolution
CaseSolution.description: Represents the association between a Case and a Solution.

CaseId.description: Required. ID of the Case associated with the Solution.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

SolutionId.description: Required. ID of the Solution associated with the case.
